channel.title: Mathematics on Down the wabbit's hole
channel.description: Recent content in Mathematics on Down the wabbit's hole

item.title: Linear Algebra
item.description: syllabus: vectors and dot products matrix algebra subspaces(fundamental theorem of linear algebra) least squares determinants, cramer’s rule eigenvalues singular values and singular vectors linear transformation complex vectors and matrices, fast fourier transform applications of things learned ties to computation aplications in probability and statistics

item.title: Statistics
item.description: Trends - A trend is defined as a pattern of change. sns.lineplot - Line charts are best to show trends over a period of time, and multiple lines can be used to show trends in more than one group. Relationship - There are many different chart types that you can use to understand relationships between variables in your data. sns.barplot - Bar charts are useful for comparing quantities corresponding to different groups.
